document_name_accent: teo co do dai thao duong.json
document_title: Diabetic muscular atrophy: Causes, symptoms and treatment
subsection_content: The cause of diabetic muscular atrophy is mainly due to abnormal changes in the immune system that damage small blood vessels that feed the nerves that supply the lower limbs. This process is called microangiitis. Muscle atrophy was not related to the duration of diabetes or the severity of the disease. (first)
subsection_title: teo co do dai thao duong.json. Causes of diabetic muscular atrophy
subsection_data:
teo co do dai thao duong.json. Causes of diabetic muscular atrophy
The cause of diabetic muscular atrophy is mainly due to abnormal changes in the immune system that damage small blood vessels that feed the nerves that supply the lower limbs. This process is called microangiitis. Muscle atrophy was not related to the duration of diabetes or the severity of the disease. (first)
